summary: Build a fully responsive, premium Islamic documentary-style website (digital archive aesthetic) about Hazrat Sakhi Habib Sultan Nangiana with emerald/gold theme, reading-focused layout, animations, SEO, accessibility, gallery, and optional spiritual mode audio toggle.
architectural_notes: Single-page documentary reading experience with multiple themed sections (hero, documentary, timeline, reflections, legacy, storytelling, gallery, contact).
Design system: deep emerald + royal gold palette, geometric Islamic patterns, glassmorphism cards, premium typography optimized for long-form reading.
Include smooth scroll-triggered animations, subtle parallax, sticky nav, and scroll progress indicator while keeping performance fast.
SEO + accessibility as first-class requirements (meta description, semantic structure, mobile-first, readable contrast).
Optional ambient audio mode must be muted by default and user-controlled.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Islamic geometric repeating background pattern, soft glow, emerald base with subtle gold lines (islamic-pattern-bg.dim_2400x1350.png)
- Islamic-style favicon icon with geometric motif, emerald and gold, minimal and crisp (favicon-islamic.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Create a fully responsive single-page documentary website (reading-focused) with a modern 2026 Islamic historical digital archive aesthetic using a deep emerald green + royal gold theme, soft glowing Islamic geometric background patterns, premium typography (serif headings, highly readable body), and a calm respectful spiritual atmosphere.

Implement a sticky navigation bar with section anchors (Hero, Documentary, Timeline, Reflection, Shrine & Legacy, Storytelling, Gallery, Contact) and add a scroll progress indicator that reflects page scroll position.

Build a cinematic hero section at the top with the title “Hazrat Sakhi Habib Sultan Nangiana”, subtitle “A Spiritual Light of Punjab”, a soft blurred mosque/shrine-style background, and a primary call-to-action button labeled “Read Documentary” that scrolls to the Documentary section.

Create the main Documentary reading section and format the provided documentary content into well-structured paragraphs with drop-cap styling on the first paragraph, elegant spacing, and long-form readability (comfortable line length, line height, and max-width).

Add a subtle timeline section highlighting: early life, spiritual journey, role as Islamic judge (Qazi), and dedication to adal (justice) and taqwa, using a premium minimal timeline layout consistent with the site theme.

Create a highlighted Spiritual Reflection box discussing the passing of his children (including Mitha Masoom) and connect it to Islamic teachings of sabr and tawakkul; present it as a visually emphasized, respectful reflection module.

Add a Shrine & Legacy section describing his burial in Dharema, Sargodha as a spiritual center for the Nangiana family and devotees, and include animated counters that represent generations inspired and ongoing influence.

Create a premium storytelling section titled “Why We Are Nangiana” explaining the traditional belief that his words carried spiritual authority, the symbolic folklore comparison to a cobra (Naang), and the origin of the clan name Nangiana; design it as an animated, premium storytelling card.
Add elegant quote highlight cards with Islamic design elements (gold accents, geometric motifs, subtle glow) to emphasize key lines; ensure the quote content is user-facing English and respectful.
Implement a Gallery section using the 3 uploaded images and provide a smooth lightbox experience (open, next/prev, close, keyboard accessible).
Add a simple visitor message contact form with name and message fields; validate inputs on the client and submit to the backend; show success/failure feedback states.

Add smooth modern animations: fade-in on scroll for sections, subtle parallax effects for background layers, soft golden section dividers, and glassmorphism content cards; ensure animations respect “prefers-reduced-motion”.

Implement SEO essentials: set page title, meta description about Hazrat Sakhi Habib Sultan Nangiana, Open Graph basics (title/description/image), semantic headings, and performance-friendly asset loading.
Add an Islamic-style favicon and integrate it into the site.

(Optional) Add a “Spiritual Mode” toggle that enables soft ambient background audio; the audio must be muted by default and only plays after explicit user interaction; provide clear play/pause state and volume control or a gentle fixed volume.
Use the provided uploaded images as site assets (hero/gallery/section imagery) and ensure they are displayed respectfully (no aggressive cropping) with captions or context where appropriate.
Ensure the final app is cleanly structured and deployable as a public link from the build system, with fast loading and fully mobile-friendly behavior.

Homepage cinematic hero with title/subtitle, blurred mosque/shrine background, and 'Read Documentary' CTA button
Documentary reading section formatted for long reading (structured paragraphs, drop-cap first letter, elegant spacing) using provided content
Timeline section covering early life, spiritual journey, role as Qazi/Islamic judge, dedication to adal and taqwa
Spiritual reflection box about passing of children (incl. Mitha Masoom) tied to sabr and tawakkul
Shrine & legacy section (burial in Dharema, Sargodha) plus animated counters for generations inspired/ongoing influence
Storytelling section 'Why We Are Nangiana' as premium animated card + quote highlight cards with Islamic design elements
Gallery section prepared for provided shrine images with smooth lightbox effect
Simple visitor message contact form (name + message)
